basics.name: Sean Elvidge
basics.summary: Head of Space Environment and Radio Engineering (SERENE) at the University of Birmingham, UK.

work.name: Space Envionrment and Radio Engineering (SERENE), University of Birmingham
work.position: Head of Group, Associate Professor of Space Environment
work.summary: Leading of SERENE group with a large and diverse portfolio of grants, and over twenty-five members of staff. Undergraduate and Masters level teaching responsibilities and course development. Developing the next generation of space weather models.

volunteer.summary: Developed and run residential physics, mathematics and engineering courses. Charity Ambassador.

awards.title: Issac Koga Gold Medal
awards.summary: For his ground-breaking work in ionospheric modelling and its operational development to the broader community
